node.title: Waikato man Thomas Phillips fails to appear in court, arrest warrant issued
node.content: ["A man charged with causing the wasteful deployment of police personnel and resources in relation to a search and rescue operation in Waikato last year now has a warrant out for his arrest, after failing to appear in court.", "Police officers and other agencies searched for weeks in September for Thomas Phillips and his three children. They eventually returned to their family after spending time in the bush.\u00a0", "Phillips was charged in October and was due to appear in the Te Kuiti District Court on Wednesday but did not turn up.", "His lawyer, Garth O'Brien, told the court his client was advised of the requirement to attend Wednesday's hearing but \"he has not been in contact\".", "\u00a0"]
